text.section: Unless registration of a mark is renewed for a 10-year term as provided in this section, the registration expires on the tenth anniversary of its effective date.

Within 1 year before registration of a mark expires, the Secretary of State shall mail to the registrant, at the last known address of the registrant:
a renewal application form; and
a notice that states:
the date on which the current registration expires;
the date by which the Secretary of State must receive the renewal application for the renewal to be issued and mailed before the registration expires; and
the amount of the renewal fee.
The Secretary of State shall renew the registration of and issue a renewal certificate to each registrant who meets the requirements of this section.
